Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,504,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dave Stewart (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/1985, off Ron Guidry (NYY)...
Injured on 6/24/1985 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 8/15/1985 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,085,714 through salary arbitration...
8/19/1986: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $1,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Traded from Seattle to Detroit on 2/2/1988 (Going to SEA: P Greg Swindell, P Dennis Cook, P Colin Ward, C Mackey Sasser. Going to DET: P Greg Hibbard, 3B Gary Sheffield, 3B Jim Presley, LF Gorma
n Thomas, RF Tom Brunansky)...
Traded from Detroit to Los Angeles on 8/4/1989 (Going to LAD: RF Tom Brunansky. Going to DET: LF Chris Gwynn, P Darrel Akerfelds, P Dave Pavlas, P Mike Maddux)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/26/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1992 to a minor league contract.
